Issue.creator: boydjohnson
Issue.summary: Add another run_scheduler method to yaml scheduler tester
Issue.description: The order of next_transaction, set_transaction_result, finalize, and complete can vary widely, with only some being possible.Â The run_scheduler method currently is greedy on next_transaction getting the possible next_transaction after each subsequent set of set_transaction_result. Another method should be written that is greedy on set_transaction_result.
